name: Gods Wars I:Lost Angel
description:
This time, you will face the Fallen God.

Gods Wars I is an epic ARPG that pits your wits against enemies. With the world enveloped by darkness, ancient powers reach forth to corrupt the plane, only you can take on the darkness.

Features:
.Addictive action RPG gameplay!
.Explore a huge world and defeat fearsome bosses.
.Unleash and upgrade skills to aid your quest.
.Collect over 100 epic weapons and armors against enemy.


Bug Report: zcy@ychengame.com
